Creating a Blog Using Jekyll

May 03, 2016

I will be documenting the processes necessary to create a blog post using Jekyll. This will be considerded my first post, but I will be mainly focused on the styling of these pages instead of the actual blog content. I need to dedicate time to the art of front-end design, mastering HTML and CSS markup languages. These can be rather tedious processes, but I'm assured that the more time devoted to this skill and experience with writing in these languages that it will go better in future iterations/usages.

After installing the Jekyll gem, I am able to use the command "jekyll serve" to begin running my website via a local host socket, as well as auto-generating a _site folder that contains my posts and stylings
